title: Sign patterns of principal minors of real symmetric matrices
authors: Tobias Boege, Jesse Selover, Maksym Zubkov
abstract:
We analyze a combinatorial rule satisfied by the signs of principal minors of
a real symmetric matrix. The sign patterns satisfying this rule are equivalent
to uniform oriented Lagrangian matroids. We first discuss their structure and
symmetries and then study their asymptotics, proving that almost all of them
are not representable by real symmetric matrices. We offer several conjectures
and experimental results concerning representable sign patterns and the
topology of their representation spaces.
